Alimatou Héma is a passionate biomedical researcher, currently working as a Clinical Pharmacist and Biologist at the "Groupe de Recherche Action en Santé" (GRAS), Ouagadougou in Burkina Faso. She has a strong academic background, holding a PharmD, a MSc in Microbiology, and a Specialized Diploma in Clinical Biology. She is currently pursuing a PhD in Microbiology
